title: TypeScript configuration package
description: Create packages/typescript-config as a shared workspace package containing base TypeScript compiler configurations. Includes base.json (strict, ES2022, Bundler resolution, isolatedModules), react.json (extends base, adds DOM libs and JSX), react-native.json (extends base, adds react-native types), and a minimal package.json naming the package @nutricodex/typescript-config.
acceptance_criteria: packages/typescript-config/package.json exists with name @nutricodex/typescript-config, version 0.0.0, private true
base.json sets strict: true, target: ES2022, module: ESNext, moduleResolution: Bundler, jsx: react-jsx, skipLibCheck: true, esModuleInterop: true, resolveJsonModule: true, isolatedModules: true
react.json extends ./base.json and adds lib: [DOM, DOM.Iterable, ES2022], noEmit: true
react-native.json extends ./base.json and adds lib: [ES2022], types: [react-native], noEmit: true
